conbody.p: Role Management allows the administrator to manage ENM System roles, COM roles, COM role alias and custom roles.

ul.li: System roles are roles predefined in the ENM system. There is no possibility to modify system roles.
COM roles allocate specific privileges on nodes supporting ECIM.
COM role alias is a set of COM roles, which groups these roles for easier assignment to user.

Custom roles consist of a combination of ENM application privileges and COM roles. Custom roles allows creation of a fine-grained set of application access rights in the form of resource-action pairs.
